amendment.description: An amendment numbered 64 printed in the Congressional Record to strike all after the enacting clause and insert a section titled Domestic Oil and Gas for the SPR.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike all after the enacting clause and insert a new section which required the Secretary of Energy to acquire petroleum products for the Strategic Petroleum Reserve that are produced from sources located in the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Vasquez amendment (A057) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 240 (Roll no. 81).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A057) offered by Mr. Vasquez.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Vasquez amendment (A057) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 240 (Roll no. 81).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
